Room.Name: Light Clouds
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a cloud over the western end of Vallenda Pass. 40.n2.e0.s0.w25
Room.LongDescription: You are also near the southwestern end of Mount Aphinix, which is the home of a clan of mountain trolls that occasionally try to invade surrounding cities. Long ago, the village of brownhaven had a pitched battle with them, and almost wiped them out. Now, they are mostly just a nuisance.
